course_main_structural_unit.address:
L. Puusepa 1a
50406 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Family medicine is a subject that covers the development and definition of family medicine, the scope, methods and tools of the family doctor's work, the most common health problems and the possibilities for intervention at primary health care level, including disease prevention and working with risk groups. Emphasis will be placed on a problem-oriented approach to the individual and his family, and on training in the medical thinking that characterizes primary care. The content of family medicine for different age groups, the methodology of the different types of consultations (contact, remote, home visits) and the specificities of outpatient care in comparison with hospital medicine will be addressed.
description.et: Perearstiteadus on aine, milles käsitletakse perearstiteaduse arengut ja mõistet, perearsti töövaldkondi, -meetodeid ja -vahendeid; käsitletakse sagedasemaid terviseprobleeme ning sekkumise võimalusi esmatasandil, muuhulgas haiguste ennetamist ning tööd riskirühmadega. Põhitähelepanu osutatakse probleemikesksele lähenemisele indiviidile ja perekonnale ning treenitakse esmatasandi arstiabile iseloomulikku arstikku mõtlemist. Käsitletakse perearstiabi sisu erinevates vanuserühmades, erinevate vastuvõtu võimaluste metoodikat (kontakt-, kaug-, koduvisiit) ning ambulatoorse arstiabi iseärasusi võrreldes haiglameditsiiniga.

objectives.en: The objectives of this course is to give an overview of family medicine and family doctor's work, to introduce the working methods and investigation possibilities in primary care.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade peremeditsiinist ja perearsti tööst, tutvustada perearstiabis sagedamini kasutatavaid töövõtteid ning patsientide uurimise võimalusi esmatasandil.

learning_outcomes.en: is able to name the core values and characteristics of family medicine; knows the basic tasks of a family doctor; is able to name the main health problems that are referred to the primary health care center; have practiced the most common methods of examining patients in the primary health care center.
learning_outcomes.et: oskab nimetada peremeditsiini põhiväärtusi ja eriala iseloomustavaid tegureid; teab perearsti põhilisi tööülesandeid; oskab nimetada peamisi terviseprobleeme, millega pöördutakse perearstikeskusse; on praktiliselt harjutanud perearstikeskuses läbi viidavaid sagedasemaid patsientide uurimise meetodeid.

independent_work.et:
Before the practical seminar on topic upper respiratory tract infections student must carry out an independent group work: finding out what home-based treatment methods patients use (survey) and what are the possible benefits, evidence and risks of them on upper respiratory tract infections (literature search). As group work, a presentation summarizing the main findings must be created and presented at this seminar.

During the study visit to family practice center you will complete an observation diary, which discussion will be held in the seminar after the study visit. 

NB! The independent task's instructions are added into the Moodle. Please review the instructions. In addition, the lecturer will provide an overview of the independent tasks during the first introductory seminar.

description.et: Presentation of the group work results of the upper respiratory tract infection topic (slide show) at the seminar. Group work must be done according to the given criteria.
Must perform the practical assignment in the skillslab seminar: explain the investigation (what he is doing and why), perform the task and analyse results (what does it mean).
During the family practice center visit fill in the observation diary and present results in the seminar.
All lecture tests (self-control tests) are conducted at a maximum score (100%) in the Moodle.

The final test in the Moodle`i consists of 10 questions and cover both lecture and seminar materials. It must be performed at least 80% score. The number of performance is one time. The time for taking the test is 20 minutes and it is pre determined (see the schedule of your group) and the test cannot be taken at another time. You take the test at home one time during the given time.

debt_elimination.et: Debts must be eliminated upon individual agreement with their own group teacher (whose name can be found on the timetable added to the study materials).

resources.mandatory_materials: Materials of lectures and practical seminars are in the Moodle
